Occupation History:
Mathilde Ida Christensen is a 37 year old CEO from Denmark. She has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
In 2011, Mathilde Ida Christensen started working as a Research Scientist at Bavarian Nordic A/S, marking the beginning of her successful career.
Her subsequent role was as a Biotech Startup Founder at Bavarian Nordic A/S, where she continued to grow professionally from 2015 to 2016.
Her tenure as a CEO at  Zealand Pharma A/S from 2018 till now was marked by significant achievements and a deepening understanding of the field.

Her remarkable portfolio comprises 3 stunning properties. Situated in prime locations across Esbjerg, Varde and Gladsaxe, these assets demonstrate their sophisticated understanding of real estate investments and high-end lifestyle preferences.
She inherited 15560000 DKK from her grandmother, a well-known Oil and Gas Executive, in 2015, allowing her to expand her investment portfolio.
